name: Index Meta-Database
description: Index for Materials Cloud databases exposing an OPTIMADE API.

name: Materials-Consortia's list of providers
description: List of OPTIMADE API providers by Materials-Consortia, pointing to materials database providers.

name: Automated high-throughput Wannierisation
description: Validation results of an automated protocol for generating maximally-localized Wannier functions in a high-throughput framework.

name: CURATED covalent organic frameworks database
description: Database of experimentally reported Covalent-Organic Frameworks (COFs), provided with DFT-optimized geometry and DDEC partial charges for molecular simulations.

name: OPTIMADE Sample Database
description: Database with example structures for OPTIMADE tests.

name: Three-dimensional crystals database
description: Curated set of relaxed three-dimensional crystal structures based on raw CIF data from the experimantal databases MPDS, COD, and ICSD.

name: COFs for CO2 capture and storage applications
description: A curated set of COFs with the highest Henry coefficient for CO2, where the full CO2 and N2 isotherm and the parasitic energy for the process have been computed.
